title: Why do ADCs get to be broken for entire seasons before being nerfed
body:
Lucian was THE UNCONTESTED best ADC last season and he didn't receive ANY significant nerfs until after it was over.

Jinx has a 37% PICK rate in solo queue with a 55% win rate. 

If ANY Assassin in the game had those kind of numbers they'd be nerfed into the floor before a new patch even came out. (But that won't happen because Assassins are the hardest champs in the game to play).

I mean at any one time there are 2-3 Pick this ADC or we lose champs, and you have champions like {{champion:21}} who need a complete rework.
